t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: FloweRock 5LB Red Lava Rock - Quarter (1/4" - 3/8")
s: Just sterilized in boiling water and not much dust comes off like some brands. You will want to wash before using, but the powder was minimal. I will buy this again if I need more, very satisfied. ... I switched to flowerock quarter lava rock (scoria) instead of using per lite.
